Posts.Content: Apr 8, 2013 07:17PM Bethblue wrote: I have been there, as so many of us have. Â I had to wait one week each after each of my surgeries, and four weeks for the Oncatype result (the doctor forgot to send the tissue in so a two week wait became a four week wait). Looking back the advice I would have given myself is to keep busy, exercise a lot, talk with friends and family, hang out with your kids or grandkids, and breathe. The time will pass. Wishing you good luck.
Posts.Title: This is torture SonjaJ sharon1953-
